title: crevopunch
author: crevopunch
content: Hi guys, I recently started my journey through crypto investigation, especially Bitcoin.I was wondering two things : Do you have any ressources / formations on the subject apart from Nick Furneaux's books and 2k$ formations I can't afford ?Do you, or someone you know, needs my help to retrace funds from a scam to an exchange ? Or even find more informations about the person behind etc. Feel free to send me a message, I'll gladly help Have a good day everyone

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Bro, you don't need even to buy any books to learn Bitcoin. There are a lot of YouTube blogs regarding Bitcoin from which you can learn. You should start from the beginning since you aren't still a pro user. The best option is to be active in this forum and read as much as you can. So a lot of things you may learn from here. If anything related you don't find then you are free to create a new thread like this. But before that use the forum search button. Google search also helps to learn Bitcoin. Don't invest in greedy advertising lol. Regarding recovering funds from a scammer don't believe in someone that promises and will take fees from you. Just take legal action if you can. Crypto is irreversible, so only legal authorities could help.
